headline: Moody’s upgrades PG&E on reduced credit risks from wildfires
summary: “In the backdrop of the recent LA wildfires, we expect any legislative and regulatory actions resulting from the state's continued wildfire risk will remain supportive for utilities,” Moody's said.

raw.headline: Moody’s upgrades PG&E on reduced credit risks from wildfires
raw.summary: “In the backdrop of the recent LA wildfires, we expect any legislative and regulatory actions resulting from the state's continued wildfire risk will remain supportive for utilities,” Moody's said.

headline: GM Energy joins PG&E bidirectional EV charging pilot in California
summary: Certain electric vehicle owners are now eligible for discounts on charging equipment that can be used to power homes during blackouts.

raw.headline: GM Energy joins PG&E bidirectional EV charging pilot in California
